name: paper
title: Paper
author: Yegor Timoshenko
description: Instapaper addon. Press toolbar button, right-click menu option, or customizable hotkey to send current page to Instapaper. Send links in bulk by shift-clicking them.

ru.description: Аддон для Instapaper. Чтобы послать статью в Instapaper, нажмите на кнопку в тулбаре, или выставляемый хоткей на клавиатуре, или опцию по клику правой кнопкой мыши. Чтобы добавить много ссылок сразу, зажмите Shift и прокликайте по нужным ссылкам.

preferences.name: password
preferences.title: Password
preferences.description: Stored on your computer unencrypted. Sent only to Instapaper servers and only through encrypted connection. Leave empty if your account doesn't have a password.

preferences.name: combo
preferences.title: Hotkey
preferences.description: Saves current page to Instapaper when pressed. Leave blank to turn it off. Restart your browser in order to apply changes.

preferences.label: Set
preferences.name: setCombo
preferences.title: Set hotkey
preferences.description: Press the button on the right and then press hotkey on your keyboard. Press ESC to cancel.

preferences.name: modifier
preferences.title: Modifier key
preferences.description: While pressed, left-click on a link and it will be sent to Instapaper. Restart your browser in order to apply changes.

preferences.name: notifications
preferences.title: Notifications
preferences.description: Sends a system notification when you successfully add a link to Instapaper.

preferences.name: rightClick
preferences.title: Right-click menu option
preferences.description: Adds “Send To Instapaper” option to context menu when you right-click a link. Restart browser in order to apply changes.
